scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: dialog Accept: application/dialog-info+xml Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
